FuncDef:
The pcp port-set max-size command sets the maximum size of a port set.
The undo pcp port-set max-size command deletes the maximum size of a port set.
By default, the maximum port set size is not set, and the Port Set Option function is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a maximum port set size.
The value is an integer that ranges from 2 to 64.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the CPE sends a PCP request and the PCP request packet carries Port Set Option to apply for a public port set, run the pce port-set command to enable the Port Set Option function and set the maximum size of the port set.
Prerequisites
The port-range command has been run in the DS-Lite instance.
Precautions
This command is mutually exclusive with the port-single command in the DS-Lite instance view.
This command is mutually exclusive with the inter-chassis hot backup scenario.
